abstract.value: This dataset provides access to yearly gridded observation climate indicator data driving time-series visualizations on ClimateData.ca. Climatedata.ca is a climate data portal produced collaboratively by the countryâ€™s leading climate organizations and supported, in part, by the Government of Canada. The goal of this portal is to support decision makers across a broad spectrum of sectors and locations by providing the most up to date climate data in easy to use formats and visualizations.

title.value: Climatedata.ca : Yearly observed values for NRCAN ANUSPLIN v1 derived climate indicators
